definitions: Planned and designed a sequence of drawings or images, often with accompanying text or dialogue, to visually represent the scenes and action of a film, television show, advertisement, or other visual media.
Created a visual outline or graphic organizer for a project, breaking it down into a series of panels or frames to show the progression and key elements.
examples: The director storyboarded the entire action sequence.
She storyboarded her presentation to ensure a smooth flow.
The team storyboarded the user journey for the new app.
